name: Gouki Dragon Ogre
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Gouki" Spell from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 EARTH monster you control; while you control that face-up monster, your opponent's monsters can only target it for attacks, also add 1 "Gouki" monster with less ATK than that monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Gouki Dragon Ogre" once per turn.
